mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLYID as id, R.ARTICLEID, R.PARENTID, R.REPLY, R.REPLYERID, u.NICKNAME as replyerNickname, R.REPLYDATE, R.UPDATEREPLYDATE, U.NICKNAME AS replyNickname FROM REPLY R JOIN USER_INFO U ON R.REPLYERID = U.ID WHERE R.ARTICLEID = #{articleId}

SELECT A.ID, A.ARTICLEID, A.PARENTID, A.REPLY, A.REPLYERID, A.REPLYDATE, A.UPDATEREPLYDATE, A.RNUM FROM (SELECT REPLYID as id, ARTICLEID, PARENTID, REPLY, REPLYERID, REPLYDATE, UPDATEREPLYDATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REPLYID) AS rnum FROM REPLY WHERE ARTICLEID = #{replyCriteria.Id} AND REPLYID = PARENTID AND REPLYID < #{replyCriteria.cursor} ) A WHERE A.RNUM <= #{replyCriteria.amount} ORDER BY A.RNUM
